unnormalised: Dude, seriously, use Python 3.9 or higher, not 2.7 - it's outdated! Also, learn about using virtualenvs, it'll save you from dependency hell, trust me.
normalised: Dude, seriously, use Python three point nine or higher, not two point seven - it's outdated! Also, learn about using virtualenvs, it'll save you from dependency hell, trust me.
